publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1356 Nicola Sturgeon: Community Care-That the Parliament is concerned about the current waiting lists held by local authorities of people in hospital and at home who have been assessed as needing residential and nursing home care but for whom no funding is available; recognises that home care services are inadequate to enable them to stay safely within their own home; notes that most of the additional funding announced by the Minister for Health and Community Care on 5 October 2000 will not be introduced until April 2001 and therefore calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward proposals as a matter of urgency to address these issues before the onset of winter. Supported by: Shona Robison*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Michael Russell*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-1356 Community Care (lodged on 14 November 2000) Fiona McLeod*
